params.randomWord: The random value answering the request.

RequestSent(uint256).details: Emitted when a request is sent to the VRF Coordinator

changeCallbackGasLimit(uint32).details: Changes the callback gas limit of the contract.

changeGovernor(address).details: Changes the governor of the contract.

changeKeyHash(bytes32).details: Changes the key hash of the contract.

changeRequestConfirmations(uint16).details: Changes the request confirmations of the contract.

changeSortitionModule(address).details: Changes the sortition module of the contract.

changeSubscriptionId(uint256).details: Changes the subscription ID of the contract.

changeVrfCoordinator(address).details: Changes the VRF Coordinator of the contract.

constructor.details: Constructor, initializing the implementation to reduce attack surface.https://docs.chain.link/vrf/v2-5/subscription/get-a-random-number

params._callbackGasLimit: The limit for how much gas to use for the callback request to the contract's fulfillRandomWords() function.
params._keyHash: The gas lane key hash value - Defines the maximum gas price you are willing to pay for a request in wei (ID of the off-chain VRF job).
params._requestConfirmations: How many confirmations the Chainlink node should wait before responding.
params._sortitionModule: The address of the SortitionModule contract.
params._subscriptionId: The unique identifier of the subscription used for funding requests.
params._vrfCoordinator: The address of the VRFCoordinator contract.

returns.randomNumber: The random number or 0 if it is not ready or has not been requested.

requestRandomness(uint256).details: Request a random number. SortitionModule only.

devdoc.title: Random Number Generator that uses Chainlink VRF v2.5 https://blog.chain.link/introducing-vrf-v2-5/

RequestFulfilled(uint256,uint256).notice: Emitted when a request has been fulfilled.

acceptOwnership().notice: Allows an ownership transfer to be completed by the recipient.

setCoordinator(address).notice: Sets the VRF Coordinator addressThis method should only be callable by the coordinator or contract owner

transferOwnership(address).notice: Allows an owner to begin transferring ownership to a new address.
